participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: resilient and hopeful, with a strong sense of independence.
participant_1.background: i was forced to marry when i was a teenager. my aunt helped me escape when i was 18. i was born in somalia. now i live in the united states.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: active and friendly, with a passion for health and fitness.
participant_2.background: i enjoy sports such as running. i'm a vegetarian. my favorite color is blue. i am married. i am a woman.
